prompts.frontCover:
A flat 2D illustration for a humorous and lighthearted birthday card for Sarah, in a dreamy fantasy anime style. In an enchanted forest clearing under a soft pastel twilight sky, two characters, based on the reference photo `003601f3-7c8c-4c1c-a8f6-523bb68c0db9`, are depicted as whimsical, illustrated versions of themselves, maintaining their exact hairstyles, facial features, body proportions, clothing (without any logos/text), and relative positions. The person on the left wears their distinctive glasses. They are comically struggling to carry an absurdly oversized, glowing birthday cake that floats slightly, adorned with mischievous, giggling forest sprites. The scene is filled with detailed, magical nature elements: glowing mushrooms, sparkling fireflies, and trailing vines with shimmering flowers, creating an enchanting, fairy-tale atmosphere. Centered in the middle of the card, in a beautiful, readable handwritten cursive script, is the text: "Happy Birthday, Sarah! Hope it's as extra as you are."

- Reference photos provided for character creation
- Characters should only appear on the front cover
- Transform real people into artistic cartoon/illustrated versions matching the style
- Maintain recognizable features while adapting to the artistic style
